headline.main: HONOR A.E.F. DEAD AMID WAR DEBATE; 77th Division Association Holds Memorial -- Speakers Divide on Present Conflict STAY OUT, PRIEST URGES ' We Are Already In,' Another Chaplain Says -- Gold Star Mothers at Ceremony

lead_paragraph: Opinions sharply divided along "isolationist" and "interventionist" lines were expressed yesterday afternoon by speakers commemorating the World War dead of the Seventy-seventh Division of the A.E.F. and honoring the survivors of the division's "Lost Battalion" and the Gold Star Mothers in a service at the Mall in Central Park.
abstract: 77th Div Veterans Assn honors group, N Y C

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: GOLD STAR MOTHERS OF WORLD WAR, AMER, INC
